subject: Swimming
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Two years after a sexual abuse scandal, USA Swimming has barred 16 people for life as part of a wide-ranging program that increased training and led to enhanced background checks.
snippet: Two years after a sexual abuse scandal, USA Swimming has barred 16 people for life as part of a wide-ranging program that increased training and led to enhanced background checks.
